description: This is a unit test file for the NoteService class, testing CRUD operations and error handling in a Spring Boot application context.

classes.name: NoteServiceTest
classes.description: JUnit test class for testing the NoteService functionality and behavior.

methods.name: setUp
methods.description: Initializes the security context and clears the repository before each test.

methods.name: createReadUpdateDelete_HappyPath
methods.description: Tests the full lifecycle of creating, reading, updating, and deleting a note.

methods.name: update_NotFound_Throws
methods.description: Ensures that updating a non-existent note throws an EntityNotFoundException.
